Reviews.Title: Not Recommended Anyone Buys This TV
Reviews.Author: Charles A. Thomason
Reviews.Content: If any of you ever see a good deal on a flat-screen TV sold by APEX...DO NOT BUY!!! They are junk. Both of my HDMI ports burned out after 18 months and since it is out of it's 1 year warranty, they want to sell me a $90 part instead of backing their product like any reputable company would.  I guess the Chinese factories don't allow good customer service.  APEX doesn't even make the TV even though their name is all over it.  It's made by a company called KCPI.

Reviews.Title: No audio out port
Reviews.Author: Dominic
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for 2 years and i never realised that it doesnt have an audio-out port so there is no easy way to plug a headset in also when it was new the colors were all messed up so dont buy this tv

Reviews.Title: Works quite well
Reviews.Author: Liquid
Reviews.Content: Not had any problem with the T.V. yet... The video quality is excellent and the sound is clear. Lightweight and packaged very well. Physical features are sleek. 3 HDMI ports too...
